this_title: Beats of the Heart: The Spirit of Samba - Black Music of Brazil
introduction: The Carnival in Rio has catapulted Brazilian samba to prominence around the world as the ultimate mix of exuberance, sensuality and tradition. 'The Spirit of Samba' shows how much Brazilian music has profoundly influenced all kinds of musicians around the world, especially jazz artists. Along with the samba and bossa nova, Brazilian styles have made an impact on the internation...
chinese_title: Beats of the Heart: The Spirit of Samba - Black Music of Brazil
